title: Back to The Cave
description: It's been two years since Bree Monahan left The Cave, and the conditions had been clear at her departure. There would be no going back, no second chance. Her contract was void, her relationship with all four of the brothers over. She and Laird Beaumont had gone too far, risked too much, violated clauses that should have been sacred. But when Laird calls out of the blue, Bree knows it can only mean one Under the right terms, she could be theirs again. She could go back to The Cave. But the question is should she?
author: Lucy O'Dell
